name: Distorted Sanctum- Demo
description:
The land of Danza has fallen under a serious issue where a nameless group have been active lately; whom others have started referring to as Vipers. Their goal is to achieve world peace; however, their idea of achieving peace is twisted. Should they succeed, the world and its people may remain in great danger for an eternity.

(This game is currently unfinished, and still in development, there may be differences in the full game once complete)
